import { Modal, Row, Container, Col, Button, Form, Card, Dropdown, } from "react-bootstrap"; import * as Icon from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import BackOfficeNav from "../BackOfficeNav"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const ConfigureStages = () => { const params = useParams(); // console.log(params.tournamentId); const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [isCheckIn, setIsCheckIn] = useState(false); const tournamentData = useSelector((state) => state.tournament.data); const tournament = tournamentData.find( (name) => name.tournament_name === params.tournamentId ); console.log(tournament); return (

Select a stage type

Simple
Stage containing a single round of matches.
Single Elimination
Bracket with matches where a set number of participants qualifies for the next round.
Bracket Groups
Groups in which participants play free-for-all matches in single-elimination brackets.
League
Divisions in which participants earn points in matches for a ranking. ); }; export default ConfigureStages;
